sentences.sContent: The acceptability of real number system depends on practice.
sentences.sContent_eng: The acceptability of real number system depends on practice.
sentences.sCn: 实数系统的可接受性依赖于实践。

sentences.sContent: The preliminary conclusion of this thesis is that Ding Di employed a large quantity of Chinese four-character phrases in his translation, which added to its "acceptability".
sentences.sContent_eng: The preliminary conclusion of this thesis is that Ding Di employed a large quantity of Chinese four-character phrases in his translation, which added to its "acceptability".
sentences.sCn: 本文得出的初步结论是：大陆译者丁棣在译本中采用了大量的汉语四字成语，增强了译文的“可接受性”。

phrases.pCn: 社交能力；社会可接受性；社会接受度
